import axios from"axios";import{PRODUCT_LIST_FAIL,PRODUCT_LIST_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_LIST_REQUEST,PRODUCT_DETAILS_FAIL,PRODUCT_DETAILS_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_DETAILS_REQUEST,PRODUCT_DELETE_REQUEST,PRODUCT_DELETE_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_DELETE_FAIL,PRODUCT_CREATE_REQUEST,PRODUCT_CREATE_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_CREATE_FAIL,PRODUCT_UPDATE_FAIL,PRODUCT_UPDATE_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_UPDATE_REQUEST,PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_REQUEST,PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_FAIL,PRODUCT_TOP_REQUEST,PRODUCT_TOP_SUCCESS,PRODUCT_TOP_FAIL}from"../constants/productConstants";export const listProduct=()=>async dispatch=>{try{dispatch({type:PRODUCT_LIST_REQUEST});const{data}=await axios.get("/api/products");// throw new Error("some erooe")
dispatch({type:PRODUCT_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_LIST_FAIL,payload:error.response&&error.response.data.message?error.response.data.message:error.message});}};export const listProductDetails=id=>async dispatch=>{try{dispatch({type:PRODUCT_DETAILS_REQUEST});const{data}=await axios.get("/api/products/".concat(id));// throw new Error("some erooe")
dispatch({type:PRODUCT_DETAILS_SUCCESS,payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_DETAILS_FAIL,payload:error.response&&error.response.data.message?error.response.data.message:error.message});}};export const deleteProduct=id=>async(dispatch,getState)=>{// console.log('is')
try{dispatch({type:PRODUCT_DELETE_REQUEST});const{userLogin:{userInfo}}=getState();const config={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(userInfo.token)}};const{data}=await axios.delete("/api/products/".concat(id),config);console.log(data);dispatch({type:PRODUCT_DELETE_SUCCESS});}catch(error){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_DELETE_FAIL,payload:error.response&&error.response.data.message?error.response.data.message:error.message});}};export const createProduct=()=>async(dispatch,getState)=>{try{dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE_REQUEST});const{userLogin:{userInfo}}=getState();const config={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(userInfo.token)}};const{data}=await axios.post("/api/products",{},config);console.log(data);dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE_SUCCESS,payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE_FAIL,payload:error.response&&error.response.data.message?error.response.data.message:error.message});}};export const updateProduct=product=>async(dispatch,getState)=>{// console.log('is')
try{dispatch({type:PRODUCT_UPDATE_REQUEST});const{userLogin:{userInfo}}=getState();const config={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(userInfo.token)}};const{data}=await axios.put("/api/products/".concat(product._id),product,config);console.log(data);dispatch({type:PRODUCT_UPDATE_SUCCESS,payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_UPDATE_FAIL,payload:error.response&&error.response.data.message?error.response.data.message:error.message});}};export const createProductReview=(productId,review)=>async(dispatch,getState)=>{// console.log('is')
try{dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_REQUEST});const{userLogin:{userInfo}}=getState();const config={headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(userInfo.token)}};const{data}=await axios.post("/api/products/".concat(productId,"/reviews"),review,config);console.log(data);dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_SUCCESS,payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_FAIL,payload:error.response&&error.response.data.message?error.response.data.message:error.message});}};export const listTopProducts=()=>async dispatch=>{try{dispatch({type:PRODUCT_TOP_REQUEST});const{data}=await axios.get("/api/products/".concat(34,"/top"));console.log(data);dispatch({type:PRODUCT_TOP_SUCCESS,payload:data});}catch(error){dispatch({type:PRODUCT_TOP_FAIL,payload:error.response&&error.response.data.message?error.response.data.message:error.message});}};
